title: Kindred delayed !?!?!

replies.body: They were practicing their /joke and Lamb missed and shot Wolf causing him to go AWOL in protest.
If you bothered to read the announcement, it's because of a game breaking bug. Specifically, players could lose Wolf and be unable to use certain abilities.
Well not everyone can find these announcements.
4 weeks? What the fuck? 5.20 is out next week on Wednesday.
